item.title: Camera_串口
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: % create an arduino object. instead of "/dev/cu.usbmodem1411','BaudRate" % use your serail port name. You can check it in arduino -> tools -> port. % Write the name of your port before the command 'BaudRate' in the % following string. ar = serial('/dev/cu.usbmodem1411','BaudRate',9600); % Check for the camera name with the command % webcamlist() in matlab. cameras= webcamlist(); % type "cameras" in the command window and see which camera correspond

item.title: WirePCB
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: 利用Multisim可以实现模拟，数字电路系统仿真，也可以实现PCB设计制作，一般使用Multisim进行电路仿真设计，将生成的网表修改后导
